newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.80 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.80 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 26.795 to the dollar compared with 26.849 at Tuesday's fixing and at 17.782 to the mark against 17.763.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +2.80 percent, the same as Tuesday's deviation.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated Wednesday's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +2.74.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
